channel.title: News - Polish News
channel.description: News articles related to Polish News

item.title: Spokeswoman for Polish Science Minister Resigns
item.description: Natalia Żyto, spokeswoman for Science Minister Dariusz Wieczorek, has resigned. The future of the minister is also uncertain, awaiting a decision from Prime Minister Donald Tusk.

item.title: Senate Launches SENAT–POLONIA 2025 Tender
item.description: The Senate has initiated the SENAT–POLONIA 2025 tender to support Polonia.

item.title: Polish Radio Raises EUR 25,000 for Charity
item.description: Polish Radio's Christmas charity drive successfully raised EUR 25,000 to support those in need.

item.title: Former Polish Health Minister Convicted
item.description: Adam Niedzielski received a suspended sentence for sharing a doctor's private medical data.
